text: Jean-Louis Grinda (born 25 January 1960) is a Monegasque opera manager and politician. He has been the director of the Opéra de Monte-Carlo since 2007, and he serves as a member of the National Council. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:French theatre directors Category:Opera managers Category:Chevaliers of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres Category:Officers of the Order of Cultural Merit (Monaco) Category:Monegasque politicians Category:Members of the National Council (Monaco)
title: Jean-Louis Grinda
